/*							                     */
/*   April 2008 	                 			             */
/*                                                                           */
/*****************************************************************************/
  
 This archive contains the last release of the CAENVME8100Manager.


 Content of the archive
 ----------------------

 VME8100_Manager.jar :  Java package contain all the classes to manage the CAENVME crate
 readme.txt          :  This file

 System Requirements
 -------------------
 
 - Java Run time >= 1.5
 - RXTX >=2.0 (for RS232 Communication.) Download it at http://users.frii.com/jarvi/rxtx/download.html
